post:
Support: https://client.tetahost.com/submitticket.php
Email us: support@tetahost.com

**Packages features:**

* 1 Gbps Uplink
* 1 IPv4 and 1 IPv6
* KVM
* Custom ISO upload
* VNC access
* Instant provision
* Virtualizor control panel
* DDoS Protection
* Location Roubaix, France
* Node CPU: Intel Xeon-E 2136

**Nano - €15,00/yr ~ 17,65 USD/yr**

* 512 MB DDR4 RAM
* 10 GB NVMe storage
* 2 TB monthly traffic
* 1 vCPU core
**[Order now](https://client.tetahost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=35 "Order now")**


**Nano - €20,00/yr ~ 23,53 USD/yr**

* 1 GB DDR4 RAM
* 15 GB NVMe storage
* 4 TB monthly traffic
* 1 vCPU core
**[Order now](https://client.tetahost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=36 "Order now")**

**Available Payment Methods:**

* PayPal
* Credit/Debit Card (Stripe)
* Bitcoin

For any custom offer you can contact us :)
Regards,
Adrian, Tetahost
